about_the_game:
The tollgate was built at the junction of trade routes to a nearby castle. The huge stone walls and towers of the gate towering vigorously over the passers-by, not promising much hope to those who want to avoid the guards' vigilant gaze. On both sides of the gate, a smaller market has developed where merchants offer their goods. A little further on, a river with calm water flows, fed by a dam built on the nearby lake. Once upon a time, there was a harbor here, and between the gate and the dam, there are still traces of the ruins built by a previous empire.

This DLC contains 6 battlemaps to help you to bring your TTRPG session to the next level

Once upon a time, there was a harbor here, and between the gate and the dam, there are still traces of the ruins built by a previous empire.

name: RPGScenery - Tollgate Scene

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8.1/10
  • Processor: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 950 or Equivalent

Recommended:
